tasks.label: Rebuild Plugin ZIP
tasks.command: cd /Users/alexwaldmann/blenderPlugins && rm -f AIHouseGenerator.zip && zip -r AIHouseGenerator.zip AIHouseGenerator/__init__.py AIHouseGenerator/properties.py AIHouseGenerator/preferences.py AIHouseGenerator/panels.py AIHouseGenerator/operators.py AIHouseGenerator/ai_engine.py AIHouseGenerator/blender_tools.py AIHouseGenerator/materials.py AIHouseGenerator/tool_defs.py AIHouseGenerator/oauth.py AIHouseGenerator/README.md -x '*.pyc' '*__pycache__*' '*.DS_Store' '*chat_logs*' '*_backup*' && echo 'âœ… AIHouseGenerator.zip rebuilt successfully'
